How do I apply for adoption?: How do I apply for adoption?
Can I adopt from any location?: Can I adopt from any location?
How do I contact a shelter?: How do I contact a shelter?
Can I list a pet for adoption?: Can I list a pet for adoption?
Adoptify is a platform connecting adopte: Adoption is a platform connecting adopters with pets in local shelters. Browse, apply, and find your perfect furry companion.
Adoptify allows you to browse pets avail: Adoption allows you to browse pets available for adoption, filter by your preferences, and connect directly with local shelters or organizations for the adoption process.
Yes, Adoptify is completely free to user: Yes, Adoptify is completely free to user. However, some shelters or organizations may charge a nominal adoption fee to cover the care of the pets.
To apply for adoption, select a pet you: To apply for adoption, select a pet you are interested in and follow the application process on their profile. This typically includes filling out a form and providing required information to the shelter.
Yes, you can view pets from various loca: Yes, you can view pets from various locations. However, some shelters may have restrictions or preferences for adopters within their area.
You can contact a shelter directly throu: You can contact a shelter directly through the pet's profile. Each listing includes contact details or a message option to reach the shelter.
Yes, Adoptify allows individuals or orga: Yes, Adoptify allows individuals or organizations to list pets for adoption. You need to create an account, provide details about the pet, and submit the listing for approval.
Are you sure you want to log out?: Are you sure you want to log out?
Adoptify collects user-provided informat: Adoptify collects user-provided information during account creation and adoption applications.
User data is used for adoption processes: User data is used for adoption processes, notifications, and improving Adoptify services.
Limited information is shared with shelt: Limited information is shared with shelters during adoption applications.
Adoptify employs security measures to pr: Adoptify employs security measures to protect user data.
Adoptify uses cookies for a better user: Adoptify uses cookies for a better user experience. Users can manage cookie preferences.
Adoptify may contain links to third-part: Adoptify may contain links to third-party websites or services. These links are provided for user convenience, but Adoptify does not control or endorse these external sites. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit, as we are not responsible for their practices or content.
Adoptify retains user data for as long a: Adoptify retains user data for as long as necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. After this period, the data will be securely deleted or anonymized.
Users have the right to access, correct,: Users have the right to access, correct, delete or restrict the processing of their personal information. To exercise these rights, users can contact Adoptify via the provided support channels.
Adoptify reserves the right to update or: Adoptify reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or app notifications. The revised policy will indicate the date of the last update.
If you have any questions or concerns re:
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us at: 
 Email: support@adoptify.com

Adoptify does not knowingly collect pers: Adoptify does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age. If we become aware that we have inadevertently collected such data, it will be promptly deleted.
By using Adoptify, users accept and agre: By using Adoptify, users accept and agree to these Terms of Service.
Users must be at least 18 years old or h: Users must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use Adoptify.
Users are responsible for maintaining th: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.
Adoption application are subject to revi: Adoption application are subject to review and approval by shelters.
Users agree not to engage in harmful act: Users agree not to engage in harmful activities, including unauthorized access or data manipulation.
Adoptify retains ownership of its intell: Adoptify retains ownership of its intellectual property, including but not limited to trademarks, logos, designs, and content. Users must not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works, publicly display, or exploit any part of Adoptify's intellectual property without prior written consent. Any unauthorized use may result in legal action
Users agree to the collection and use of: Users agree to the collection and use of their information as outlined in Adoptify's Privacy Policy. This includes the use of cookies, analytics, and user-provided data to enhance the app experience.
Adoptify is not liable for any direct, i: Adoptify is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of its services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages from miscommunication, loss of data, or third-party actions.
Adoptify reserves the right to suspend o: Adoptify reserves the right to suspend or terminate user accounts at its sole disrection for any violation of the Terms of Service or any suspicious activity.
Adoptify reserves the right to update or: Adoptify reserves the right to update or modify these Terms of Service at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes, and continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
These Terms of Service are governed by t: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of the application jurisdiction. Any disputes must be resolved through the courts in that jurisdiction.
For inquiries or issues related to the T: For inquiries or issues related to the Terms of Service, users can contact Adoptify's support team at support@adoptify.com.
